QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Eastern Plaguelands!
QuestData.Description: All able bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Fiona on the east bank of the Thondroril River.$B$BThe Argent Crusade has reinforced its presence in the Plaguelands and it needs your help to consolidate its victories.$B$BCross the Thondroril River at the eastern border of the Western Plaguelands and look for Fiona on the far bank.$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Fiona on the east bank of the Thondroril River in the Eastern Plaguelands.
